body: fucking love this story i just wish i could tell who was who better lol and why didnt we get to see more of the girls :(

i loved it! I found the art very cute

It seems there is a time skip.

Idk if author will fill in the missing days but from the time skip we can tell the dog just gets old and she has to part ways with the dog. Then gets married to the guy she likes and even has a daughter.

The pictures after day 1977 is just fan service, from what i understand.

This was some weird ass shit to be honest and if I understand it correctly glasses girl is an introvert and while her two friends both hook up with guys she mostly just stays in door and eventually get's sexually attracted to her dog, since it's her only male company, then along the way she doesn't go the last step but then she falls in love with a guy and when she goes to confess she see's him walking next to a girl goes home and then starts having sex with the dog every day pretty much for a week. Until even the dog seems to be tired of the sex, then she meets the guy walking with the girl and of course it was all a missunderstanding, it's his little sister, then they hook up and for the last part it's kinda unclear if she keeps having sex with the dog to "practice" her sex skills or if it happened before they hooked up. Since some parts mentions it's at day 102 or it doesn't specify outside of her training in fellatio for instance.
I just don't get this hentai
Ahhh this is the end, it was a marvelous journey 💖

So I guess this is the official end
